text:
Hi All,
Not sure which channel relevant to my question, but if you suppot would be great.
• We are implementing the chat as customer suppot chat for our logged in users.
So we need to sent to HubSpot upon any new conversation some custom fields to identify the user like the email and some extra data related to business, instead of asking the user Everytime same questions.
• Is it true that HubSpot is collecting the IP of the user, can we disable that 
• If HubSpot identifying the user by their IP, and if a user initiated a conversation, and then logged out and logged in with different user would that confilct with the previous conversation history and combine both in one?

You should utilize the Chat Visitor Identification API - <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/conversation/visitor-identification|https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/conversation/visitor-identification>
Can anyone recommend a good "add to calendar" link generator? ideally with multiple events if possible
I use this for my laravel apps: <https://github.com/spatie/calendar-links>
wonder if there is a node equivalent?
